{{Big Brother endgame | hmpage = Housemates | seriesname = Big Brother Brasil | series = Season 1 (2002) | previous = | next = Big Brother Brasil 2 | housemates = Housemates | image = | imagebg = #000 | start = January 29, 2002 | end = April 2, 2002 | hm1 = Kleber | hm1-enter = Day 1 | hm1-exit = Day 64 | hm1-stat = winner | hm2 = Vanessa | hm2-enter = Day 1 | hm2-exit = Day 64 | hm2-stat = runner | hm3 = AndrÃ© | hm3-enter = Day 1 | hm3-exit = Day 64 | hm3-stat = evic | hm4 = Sergio | hm4-enter = Day 1 | hm4-exit = Day 62 | hm4-stat = evic | hm5 = Alessandra | hm5-enter = Day 1 | hm5-exit = Day 57 | hm5-stat = five | hm6 = Estela | hm6-enter = Day 1 | hm6-exit = Day 50 | hm6-stat = evic | hm7 = Adriano | hm7-enter = Day 1 | hm7-exit = Day 43 | hm7-stat = evic | hm8 = Helena | hm8-enter = Day 1 | hm8-exit = Day 36 | hm8-stat = evic | hm9 = Cristiana | hm9-enter = Day 1 | hm9-exit = Day 29 | hm9-stat = evic | hm10 = Bruno | hm10-enter = Day 1 | hm10-exit = Day 22 | hm10-stat = evic | hm11 = Xaiane | hm11-enter = Day 1 | hm11-exit = Day 15 | hm11-stat = evic | hm12 = Caetano | hm12-enter = Day 1 | hm12-exit = Day 8 | hm12-stat = evic | legendwinner = Winner | legendrunner = Runner Up | legendevic = Evicted | legend5 = Big Boss Winner }} '''Big Brother Brasil 1''' was the first season of '''Big Brother Brasil''' which premiered January 29, 2002 with the season finale airing April 2, 2002 on the [[Rede Globo]] [[television network]]. The show was produced by [[Endemol|Endemol Globo]]. It was presented by news reporter [[Pedro Bial]] and directed by Jose Bonifacio Brasil de Oliveira. The prize award was R$500,000 without tax allowances. The winner was 24-year-old dancer Kleber de Paula, from [[Campinas]], [[SÃ£o Paulo]]. ==Overview== There were twelve housemates competing for the grand prize. The season lasted 64 days nearly a two-three weeks shorter than most seasons, making this the shortest season of the Brazilian series of Big Brother. ===Reunion Show=== The reunion was hosted by [[Pedro Bial]] and aired on April 7, 2002. All the former housemates attended. ==Housemates== (ages stated at time of contest) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Name ! Age ! Occupation ! Hometown |- | Adriano de Castro | 34 | Artist | {{Flagicon|Bahia}} [[Salvador, Bahia|Salvador]] |- | Alessandra 'Leka' Begliomini | 28 | Businesswoman | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | AndrÃ© Gabeh | 28 | Singing Teacher | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Bruno Saladini | 28 | Model | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Caetano Zonaro | 39 | Model | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[SÃ£o Paulo]] |- | Cristiana Mota | 28 | Singer | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Estela Padilha | 24 | Videographer | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[SÃ£o Paulo]] |- | Helena Louro | 25 | Actress | {{Flagicon|ParanÃ¡}} [[MaringÃ¡]] |- | Kleber de Paula | 24 | Dancer | {{Flagicon|SÃ£o Paulo}} [[Campinas]] |- | Sergio Tavares | 30 | Hairdresser | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Vanessa Pascale | 28 | Model | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |- | Xaiane Dantas | 27 | Barwoman | {{Flagicon|Rio de Janeiro}} [[Rio de Janeiro]] |} ==Voting History== The voting table below records whom each housemate voted to nominate on the diary room during his or her time in the House. The Head of Household vote (casted in front of the other housemates) automatically nominate one housemate from eviction. Then, the other housemates voting and if the vote is tied, the HOH breaks the tie (all this types of vote count for the total number of nominations received). {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%; line-height:13px;" |- ! ! to win |} * At week 4 there was a tie vote between Estela and Kleber, and Alessandra, as the head of the house, choose Estela to face Cristiana. ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== ;Official * [http://bbb1.globo.com/ Big Brother Brasil 1] ;Other * [http://www.terra.com.br/exclusivo/bigbrother1/ Terra: BBB1] {{Big Brother Brasil}} [[Category:2002 television seasons]] [[Category:Big Brother Brasil]] [[Category:Big Brother seasons]] [[es:Big Brother (Brasil)]] [[pt:Big Brother Brasil]]
